description: Try our easy to follow Double Choc Ice-Cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Double Choc Ice-Cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 20x30cm cake pan with baking paper.
Prepare cake mix as per packet instructions. Pour into pan and cook for 30 minutes until cake is cooked when tested with a skewer. Cool for 5 minutes then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
Remove ice cream from freezer and allow to soften slightly. Cut out 6x7cm rounds from cooled cake and cut each in half through the centre. Place 6 rounds onto serving plates.
Top each with a good scoop of ice cream and flatten with a knife. Top with the remaining cake rounds and drizzle over chocolate flavoured topping. Serve immediately
